headline.main: NYE, LA FOLLETTE CALL SHIP ARMING A 'WAR MEASURE'; They Tell Senate in Debate New 'A.E.F.' Is Inevitable if Neutrality Law Is Upset

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Oct. 29 -- The Administration resolution repealing the vital portions of the Neutrality Act of 1939 was declared a "war measure" time and again in the Senate this afternoon, as critics of President Roosevelt's foreign policy attempted to win new votes against it.
abstract: AEF predicted by Nye and La Follette, Sen
